data: Wang the Ninth was born a few years before the end of the nineteenth century in a village called prosaically in the vernacular Ten Li Hamlet because it lay ten li or Chinese miles from the great imperial highway.
Ten Li Hamlet | great imperial highway

Wang the Ninth was born a few years before the end of the nineteenth century in a village called prosaically in the vernacular Ten Li Hamlet because it lay ten _li_ or Chinese miles from the great imperial highway.
Wang the Ninth: The Story of a Chinese Boy
